title: The Robot Vacuum Arms Race Is Over, and the Incredible AI-Powered Roborock Saros Z70 Has Won
description: The world's first mass-produced robot vacuum with an intelligent robotic arm is bringing home cleaning appliances into the next generation.
author: Jean-Guillaume Kleis
